h3801.definition: or כֻּתֹּנֶת; from an unused root meaning to cover (compare {{h3802}}); a shirt; coat, garment, robe.

h3802.definition: from an unused root meaning to clothe; the shoulder (proper, i.e. upper end of the arm; as being the spot where the garments hang); figuratively, side-piece or lateral projection of anything; arm, corner, shoulder(-piece), side, undersetter.

h3803.definition: a primitive root; to enclose; hence (in a friendly sense) to crown, (in a hostile one) to besiege; also to wait (as restraining oneself); beset round, compass about, be crowned, inclose round, suffer.

h3804.definition: from {{h3803}}; properly, a circlet, i.e. a diadem; crown.

h3805.definition: feminine active participle of {{h3803}}; the capital of a column; chapiter.

h3806.definition: a primitive root; to butt or pound; bray.

h3807.definition: a primitive root; to bruise or violently strike; beat (down, to pieces), break in pieces, crushed, destroy, discomfit, smite, stamp. l

h3808.definition: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle; not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles; × before,   or else, ere,   except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), (× as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of,   surely,   as truly as,   of a truth,   verily, for want,   whether, without.

h3809.definition: (Aramaic) or לָה; (Aramaic) (Daniel 4:32), corresponding to {{h3808}}; or even, neither, no(-ne, -r), (can-) not, as nothing, without.

h3810.definition: or לוֹ דבַר; (Samuel 9:4,5), or לִדְבִר; (Joshua 13:26), (probably rather לֹדְבַר ); from {{h3808}} and {{h1699}}; pastureless; Lo-Debar, a place in Palestine; Debir, Lodebar.

h3811.definition: a primitive root; to tire; (figuratively) to be (or make) disgusted; faint, grieve, lothe, (be, make) weary (selves).

h3812.definition: from {{h3811}}; weary; Leah, a wife of Jacob; Leah.

h3813.definition: a primitive root; to muffle; cover.

h3814.definition: from {{h3813}} (or perhaps for active participle of {{h3874}}); properly, muffled, i.e. silently; softly.

h3815.definition: from the prepositional prefix and {{h410}}; (belonging) to God; Laël an Israelite; Lael.

h3816.definition: or לְאוֹם; from an unused root meaning to gather; a community; nation, people.

h3817.definition: plural of {{h3816}}; communities; Leummim, an Arabian; Leummim.

h3818.definition: from {{h3808}} and {{h5971}} with pronominal suffix; not my people; Lo-Ammi, the symbolic name of a son of Hosea; Lo-ammi.

h3819.definition: from {{h3808}} and {{h7355}}; not pitied; Lo-Ruchamah, the symbolic name of a son of Hosea; Lo-ruhamah.

h3820.definition: a form of {{h3824}}; the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything; care for, comfortably, consent, × considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), × heed, × I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), × regard(-ed), × themselves, × unawares, understanding, × well, willingly, wisdom.

h3822.definition: plural of {{h3833}}; lionesses; Lebaoth, a place in Palestine; Lebaoth. See also {{h1034}}.

h3823.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be enclosed (as if with fat); by implication (as denominative from {{h3824}}); to unheart; i.e. (in a good sense) transport (with love), or (in a bad sense) stultify; to make cakes; make cakes, ravish, be wise.

h3824.definition: from {{h3823}}; used also like {{h3820}}; the heart (as the most interior organ); bethink themselves, breast, comfortably, courage, ((faint), (tender-) heart(-ed), midst, mind, × unawares, understanding.

h3828.definition: or לְבֹנָה; from {{h3836}}; frankincense (from its whiteness or perhaps that of its smoke); (frank-) incense.

h3829.definition: the same as {{h3828}}; Lebonah, a place in Palestine; Lebonah.

h3830.definition: or לְבֻשׁ; from {{h3847}}; a garment (literally or figuratively); by implication (euphemistically) a wife; apparel, clothed with, clothing, garment, raiment, vestment, vesture.

h3832.definition: a primitive root; to overthrow; intransposed, to fall; fall.

h3833.definition: or (Ezekiel 19:2) לְבִיָּא; irregular masculine plural לְבָאִים; irregular feminine plural לְבָאוֹת; from an unused root meaning to roar; compare {{h738}}; a lion (properly, a lioness as the fiercer (although not a roarer;)); (great, old, stout) lion, lioness, young (lion).

h3834.definition: or rather לְבִבָה; from {{h3823}} in its original sense of fatness (or perhaps of folding); a cake (either as fried or turned); cake.

h3835.definition: a primitive root; also as denominative from {{h3843}}; to be (or become) white; to make bricks; make brick, be (made, make) white(-r).

h3837.definition: the same as {{h3836}}; Laban, a Mesopotamian; also a place in the Desert; Laban.

h3838.definition: or לְבָנָה; the same as {{h3842}}; Lebana or Lebanah, one of the Nethinim; Lebana, Lebanah.

h3839.definition: from {{h3835}}; some sort of whitish tree, perhaps the storax; poplar.

h3840.definition: from {{h3835}}; properly, whiteness, i.e. (by implication) transparency; paved.

h3841.definition: the same as {{h3839}}; Libnah, a place in the Desert and one in Palestine; Libnah.

h3842.definition: from {{h3835}}; properly, (the) white, i.e. the moon; moon. See also {{h3838}}.

h3843.definition: from {{h3835}}; a brick (from the whiteness of the clay); (altar of) brick, tile.

h3844.definition: from {{h3825}}; (the) white mountain (from its snow); Lebanon, a mountain range in Palestine; Lebanon.

h3845.definition: from {{h3835}}; white; Libni, an Israelite; Libni.

h3846.definition: patronymically from {{h3845}}; a Libnite or descendants of Libni (collectively); Libnites.

h3847.definition: or לָבֵשׁ; a primitive root; properly, wrap around, i.e. (by implication) to put on a garment or clothe (oneself, or another), literally or figuratively; (in) apparel, arm, array (self), clothe (self), come upon, put (on, upon), wear.

h3849.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to deepen or hollow (like {{h3537}}); a log or measure for liquids; log (of oil).

h3850.definition: from an unused root of uncertain signification; Lod, a place in Palestine; Lod.

h3851.definition: from an usused root meaning to gleam; a flash; figuratively, a sharply polished blade or point of a weapon; blade, bright, flame, glittering.

h3852.definition: or לַהֶבֶת; feminine of {{h3851}}, and meaning the same; flame(-ming), head (of a spear).

h3853.definition: plural of {{h3851}}; flames; Lehabim, a son of Mizraim, and his descendants; Lehabim.

h3854.definition: from an unused root meaning to be eager; intense mental application; study.

h3855.definition: from an unused root meaning to glow (compare {{h3851}}) or else to be earnest (compare {{h3854}}); Lahad, an Israelite; Lahad.

h3856.definition: a primitive root meaning properly, to burn, i.e. (by implication); to be rabid (figuratively, insane); also (from the exhaustion of frenzy) to languish; faint, mad.

h3857.definition: a primitive root; properly, to lick, i.e. (by implication) to blaze; burn (up), set on fire, flaming, kindle.

h3858.definition: from {{h3857}}; a blaze; also (from the idea of enwrapping) magic (as covert); flaming, enchantment.

h3859.definition: a primitive root; properly, to burn in, i.e. (figuratively) to rankle; wound.

h3860.definition: from the prepositional prefix meaning to or for and {{h2005}}; properly for if; hence, therefore; for them (by mistake for prepositional suffix).

h3861.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h3860}}; therefore; also except; but, except, save, therefore, wherefore.

h3862.definition: probably from an unused root meaning to gather; an assembly; company.

h3863.definition: or לֻא; or לוּ; a conditional particle; if; by implication (interj. as a wish) would that!; if (haply), peradventure, I pray thee, though, I would, would God (that).

h3864.definition: or לֻבִּי; (Daniel 11:43), partrial from a name probably derived from an unused root meaning to thirst, i.e. a dry region; apparently; a Libyan or inhabitant of interior Africa (only in plural); Lubim(-s), Libyans.

h3865.definition: probably of foreign derivation; Lud, the name of two nations; Lud, Lydia.

h3866.definition: or לוּדִיִּי; patrial from {{h3865}}; a Ludite or inhabitants of Lud (only in plural); Ludim. Lydians.

h3867.definition: a primitive root; properly, to twine, i.e. (by implication) to unite, to remain; also to borrow (as a form of obligation) or (caus.) to lend; abide with, borrow(-er), cleave, join (self), lend(-er).

h3868.definition: a primitive root; (compare {{h3867}}, {{h3874}} and {{h3885}}); to turn aside , i.e. (literally) to depart, (figuratively) be perverse; depart, froward, perverse(-ness).

h3869.definition: probably of foreign origin; some kind of nut-tree, perhaps the almond; hazel.

h3870.definition: probably from {{h3869}} (as growing there); Luz, the name of two places in Palestine; Luz.

h3871.definition: or לֻחַ; from a primitive root; probably meaning to glisten; a tablet (as polished), of stone, wood or metal; board, plate, table.

h3872.definition: or לֻחוֹת; (Jeremiah 48:5), from the same as {{h3871}}; floored; Luchith, a place East of the Jordan; Luhith.

h3873.definition: active participle of {{h3907}}; (the) enchanter; Lochesh, an Israelite; Hallohesh, Haloshesh (includ. the article).

h3874.definition: a primitive root; to wrap up; cast, wrap.

h3876.definition: the same as {{h3875}}; Lot, Abraham's nephew; Lot.

h3877.definition: from {{h3875}}; covering; Lotan, an Idumaean; Lotan.

h3878.definition: from {{h3867}}; attached; Levi, a son of Jacob; Levi. See also {{h3879}}, {{h3881}}.

h3880.definition: from {{h3867}}; something attached, i.e. a wreath; ornament.

h3881.definition: or לֵוִי; patronymically from {{h3878}}; a Levite or descendant of Levi; Leviite.

h3882.definition: from {{h3867}}; a wreathed animal, i.e. a serpent (especially the crocodile or some other large sea-monster); figuratively, the constellation of the dragon; also as a symbol of Babylon; leviathan, mourning.

h3883.definition: from an unused root meaning to fold back; a spiral step; winding stair. Compare {{h3924}}.

h3884.definition: or לוּלֵי; from {{h3863}} and {{h3808}}; if not; except, had not, if (...not), unless, were it not that.

h3885.definition: or לִין; a primitive root; to stop (usually over night); by implication, to stay permanently; hence (in a bad sense) to be obstinate (especially in words, to complain); abide (all night), continue, dwell, endure, grudge, be left, lie all night, (cause to) lodge (all night, in, -ing, this night), (make to) murmur, remain, tarry (all night, that night).

h3886.definition: a primitive root; to gulp; figuratively, to be rash; swallow down (up).

h3887.definition: a primitive root; properly, to make mouths at, i.e. to scoff; hence (from the effort to pronounce a foreign language) to interpret, or (generally) intercede; ambassador, have in derision, interpreter, make a mock, mocker, scorn(-er, -ful), teacher.

h3888.definition: a primitive root; to knead; knead.

h3889.definition: from {{h3888}}; kneading; Lush, a place in Palestine; Laish (from the margin). Compare {{h3919}}.

h3890.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h3867}}; properly, adhesion, i.e. (as preposition) with; × thee.

h3892.definition: from an unused root meaning to be new; fresh, i.e. unused or undried; green, moist.

h3893.definition: from the same as {{h3892}}; freshness, i.e. vigor; natural force.

h3894.definition: or לָחֻם; passive participle of {{h3898}}; properly, eaten, i.e. food; also flesh, i.e. body; while...is eating, flesh.

h3895.definition: from an unused root meaning to be soft; the cheek (from its fleshiness); hence, the jaw-bone; cheek (bone), jaw (bone).

h3896.definition: a form of {{h3895}}; Lechi, a place in Palestine; Lehi. Compare also {{h7437}}.

h3897.definition: a primitive root; to lick; lick (up).

h3898.definition: a primitive root; to feed on; figuratively, to consume; by implication, to battle (as destruction); devour, eat, × ever, fight(-ing), overcome, prevail, (make) war(-ring).

h3899.definition: from {{h3898}}; See also {{h1036}}; food (for man or beast), especially bread, or grain (for making it); (shew-) bread, × eat, food, fruit, loaf, meat, victuals.
